title: Episode 315: The Mysterious Disappearance of Dorothy Arnold Part 2
description:
In part one we learned about the circumstances surrounding Dorothy Arnold’s disappearance. By all means it just seemed like she went out for a day of shopping and then disappeared into thin air. In part 2 Alaina delivers some theories that have been visited over the past hundred years and we both come to our own conclusion on what the heck happened to Dorothy Arnold. What’s your conclusion?

Instagram page for information on the case of Yanira Cedillos
